# Critical Care Severity Sources

## Licensing Note
These tools are derived from published research and clinical guidelines and are freely implementable with proper citation. This project uses original descriptions and does not copy proprietary content.

## Glasgow Coma Scale (GCS)
- Glasgow Coma Scale official site and scoring guidance.
- StatPearls (NCBI Bookshelf): Glasgow Coma Scale review.

## SOFA
- Vincent JL, et al. Intensive Care Med 1996;22:707-710. (SOFA derivation)
- Merck Manual Professional: SOFA component thresholds table.
- Critical Care (BMC) review tables with SOFA component thresholds.

## qSOFA
- JAMA 2016: qSOFA criteria and prognostic accuracy (Sepsis-3 era).

## MELD
- Kamath PS, et al. Hepatology 2001;33:464-470. (MELD derivation)
- Journal of Clinical and Translational Hepatology review with MELD formula summary.
- HRSA/OPTN MELD updates overview (MELD-Na adoption context).

## NIH Stroke Scale (NIHSS)
- NIH PhenX Toolkit protocol: NIH Stroke Scale items and scoring.

## APACHE IV
- Zimmerman JE, et al. Crit Care Med 2006;34:1297-1310. (APACHE IV derivation and performance)
- PubMed abstract for APACHE IV model description.
- APACHE IV coefficient tables and variable definitions are published with the original source materials.
